meanings.sent1: She anthologized her favorite poems for the school project.
meanings.sent2: The professor anthologized various essays for the class reading list.
meanings.sent3: The librarian anthologized the best short stories in a book for the community.
meanings.sent4: The chef anthologized his most popular recipes in a cookbook.
meanings.sent5: The artist anthologized her sketches into a beautiful collection.

meanings.definition: To compile or publish an anthology.
meanings.sent1: They anthologized the works of different authors into a single volume.
meanings.sent2: The publishing house anthologized classic literature for the anniversary edition.
meanings.sent3: The team anthologized the funniest jokes for the comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The editor anthologized the best poems of the year in a special edition.
meanings.sent5: The company anthologized success stories to inspire employees.
